languages.text: "Все кривляешься? Горбатого могила исправит". {n}Заведя руку за спину, {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}проктор{/g} жестом отдает команду кибермастифу, отправляя его в обход вдоль дальней стены.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Арбитес. Появляется со стороны левой стены. [РТ по центру] Направляет пса вдоль правой стены.

traits.locale_text: "Все кривляешься? Горбатого могила исправит". {n}Заведя руку за спину, {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}проктор{/g} жестом отдает команду кибермастифу, отправляя его в обход вдоль дальней стены.{/n}
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.translation_comment: Арбитес. Появляется со стороны левой стены. [РТ по центру] Направляет пса вдоль правой стены.

languages.text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Все кривляешься? Горбатого могила исправит". {n}Заведя руку за спину, проктор жестом отдает команду кибермастифу, отправляя его в обход вдоль дальней стены.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the far wall.{/n}
"Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the far wall.{/n}
"Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the far wall.{/n}
"Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}
"Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}

languages.text: “还在扮演小丑的角色吗？有些人真是从来不吸取教训。”{n}索罗蒙将手藏在身后，朝他的生化獒犬做了个手势。格雷托见状，立刻沿着墙壁的另一个方向绕了过去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “还在扮演小丑的角色吗？有些人真是从来不吸取教训。”{n}索罗蒙将手藏在身后，朝他的生化獒犬做了个手势。格雷托见状，立刻沿着墙壁的另一个方向绕了过去。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Sigue metido en el papel de bufón? Algunos nunca aprenden». {n}Solomorne hace una señal discreta a su cibermastín para que se acerque pegado a la pared.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Sigue metido en el papel de bufón? Algunos nunca aprenden». {n}Solomorne hace una señal discreta a su cibermastín para que se acerque pegado a la pared.{/n}

languages.text: "Hâlâ maskaralık mı peşindesin? Bazıları hiç ders almıyor." {n}Solomorne, arkasındaki siber mastife işaret verip onu duvar hizasında harekete geçiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hâlâ maskaralık mı peşindesin? Bazıları hiç ders almıyor." {n}Solomorne, arkasındaki siber mastife işaret verip onu duvar hizasında harekete geçiriyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「まだ道化を演じるつもりか？学習しないやつらしい」{n}ソロモーンは背後でサイバーマスチフに合図を出し、壁に沿って走らせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まだ道化を演じるつもりか？学習しないやつらしい」{n}ソロモーンは背後でサイバーマスチフに合図を出し、壁に沿って走らせる。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous jouez toujours au bouffon ? Décidément, certains n'apprennent jamais. » {n}Solomorne fait un geste dans son dos en direction du cyber-mastiff, qui se dirige vers un circuit le long du mur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous jouez toujours au bouffon ? Décidément, certains n'apprennent jamais. » {n}Solomorne fait un geste dans son dos en direction du cyber-mastiff, qui se dirige vers un circuit le long du mur.{/n}

languages.text: "Spielt Ihr immer noch den Tölpel? Manche Leute lernen es nie." {n}Solomorne gibt dem Cyber-Mastiff hinter seinem Rücken ein Zeichen. Dieser beginnt, an der Wand entlang im Kreis zu gehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Still acting the buffoon? Some people never learn." {n}Solomorne gestures behind his back to the cyber-mastiff, sending him off on a circuit along the wall.{/n}
